section.title: Finally I get around to updating my CV!
section.p: People ask me at least once a week to see my updated CV, but I keep it on a different ISP's server and never get around to updating it. This isn't because I don't want people to see it - but because I'm always working on something far more interesting :-)

However I figured it makes a good example for XPathScript. So here is the XPathScript source code. The original XML file is available by adding the querystring passthru=1 to the XML file. Link here. The passthru option is another example of an AxKit plugin. The translated version created by this stylesheet is available here.
